testcase.name: Verify that sorting trains by Arrival Time works correctly
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the ixigo home page and clicks on trains tab...............passed When the user clicks on Vande Bharath Express on the trains home page.......passed And the user enters the Source in the input text field......................passed And the user enters the Destination in the input text field.................passed And the user clicks on Search in search page................................passed And the user clicks on Arrival Time.........................................passed Then the list of trains should be displayed sorted by Arrival Time..........passed
